Ninagawa ÃƒÂ¨ un ricco politico giapponese la cui nipote ÃƒÂ¨ stata uccisa da un killer recidivo, Kunihide Kiyomaru; per questo motivo decide di mettere una taglia di un miliardo di yen sulla testa dell'uomo. Cercando di tutelarsi, Kiyomaru si consegna alle autoritÃƒÂ , creando non poco scompiglio e facendo vacillare anche l'agente piÃƒÂ¹ integerrimo...........

[img]http://s19.postimg.org/fzn6g380j/1_story.png[/img]

After killing a 7-year-old girl, psychopath Kunihide Kyomaru turns himself in to the police. Since his victim was the daughter of one of the country's richest men, terminally ill billionaire Ninagawa, who buys ads in all the major papers offering a hefty reward for anyone who kills Kunihide. There are a few caveats, including a clause that the execution must be authorized by the government, but the consequences are clear: It's open season on Kunihide............
